name: @twodashes/node
description: Node platform-specific utility functions like HTTP requests, CLI arguments, promises, operating system, version, etc. See also @twodashes/universal and @twodashes/browser

scripts.build: npm run cjs_dir && npm run cjs_index
scripts.cjs_dir: rm -rf cjs && rollup esm/*.js --format cjs --dir cjs/ --exports auto
scripts.cjs_index: rm -rf index.cjs && rollup index.mjs --format cjs --file index.cjs --exports auto
